2025-05-11.description: The IBM supercomputer Deep Blue defeated chess grandmaster Garry Kasparov in the final game of a six-game match in New York, winning 3 ½-2 ½ and marking the first time a computer won a match against a reigning world champion.

2025-05-14.title: Remembering IBM Researcher Dick Garwin
